journal-title-group.journal-title: Kardiochirurgia i Torakochirurgia Polska = Polish Journal of Cardio-Thoracic Surgery

title-group.article-title: Erratum to: Cezary Danielecki. Implantation of mitral, aortic, and tricuspid bioprostheses due to infective endocarditis with necessary reimplantation of the bioprosthetic aortic valve. Kardiochirurgia i Torakochirurgia Polska 2016; 13 (3): 248-250

body.p: In the article the names of the authors and their affiliations should be as follows:
Cezary Danielecki1, Paweł Bugajski1,2, Roman Olszewski1, Krzysztof Greberski1,2, Ryszard Kalawski1,2
1Cardiac Surgery Department, J. Strus Community Hospital, Poznan, Poland
2Department of Cardiovascular Diseases Prevention, Poznan University of Medical Sciences, Poznan, Poland
